name: Tennis Girl
description:
·This is a role-playing game about tennis, where players control beautiful girls to participate in tennis competitions.
·There are many girls in the college who enjoy playing tennis. (Currently, nearly 20 characters have been created)
·You can improve your character's level through practice matches and earn funds through performance matches.
·Players can start a challenge when they find a girl they like, and once the challenge is successful, the girl can be added to their team.
·The girl who has been defeated, can watch her photos!
·For the girls, start playing!
